Comment: Abilities: A091 (Seed of Burning Hatred), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Plant a seed of hatred onto a friendly building. The afflicted unit cannot uproot or train units and will take 300 damage per second until it dies. Upon its death, 3 mighty Charred Ancient will emerge from the host corpse permanently. The growth of the seed, once planted, cannot be stopped, dispelled, or cancelled.
